meanings.definition: To surpass in reckoning or calculation.
meanings.sent1: She outreckons her classmates in math skills.
meanings.sent2: He always outreckons his opponents in chess.
meanings.sent3: The calculator outreckons the human brain in speed.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outreckons any obstacle in her path.
meanings.sent5: The computer outreckons the old methods of calculation.

meanings.definition: To exceed in estimation or judgment.
meanings.sent3: The puppy outreckons the kitten in cuteness.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of nature outreckons any painting.
